## config variable

### config variable

Use this to access the [GrafanaBootConfig](./runtime/grafanabootconfig.md) for the current running Grafana instance.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
config: GrafanaBootConfig
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { config } from '@grafana/runtime';
```
